title: 811. Peace - Psalm 133, 1 Corinthians 1, Romans 14, James 3, 2 Corinthians 13
verses:
How wonderful it is, how pleasant,
for God's people to live together in harmony!

By the authority of our Lord Jesus Christ
I appeal to all of you, my brothers,
to agree in what you say,
so that there will be no divisions among you.
Be completely united, with only one thought
and one purpose.

So then, we must always aim at those
things that bring peace
and I that help strengthen one another.

And goodness is the harvest that is produced
from the seeds the peacemakers plant in peace.

Strive for perfection; listen to my appeals;
agree with one another; live in peace.
And the God of love and peace will be with you.
